item.title: 17 Pygmies Rare LA showcase

item.description: You are hereby advised under threat of grave regret to come out and see 17 Pygmies in a rare live appearance as part of the International Pop Overthrow West Coast festival. Also on the bill, the delightful Prix! August, 7 2007 at Spaceland1717 Silver Lake Blvd., Los Angeles, 90026Cost : $8.00 IPO Los Angeles www.clubspaceland.com … Continue reading "17 Pygmies Rare LA showcase"
item.content:encoded:
You are hereby advised under threat of grave regret to come out and see 17 Pygmies in a rare live appearance as part of the International Pop Overthrow West Coast festival. Also on the bill, the delightful Prix!

August, 7 2007 at Spaceland
1717 Silver Lake Blvd., Los Angeles, 90026
Cost : $8.00

IPO Los Angeles
www.clubspaceland.com 323-661-4380
8:30 Io Perry
9:00 The Unbearables
9:30 17 Pygmies
10:00 The Red Button
10:30 Astra Heights
11:00 The Prix
